text: Welcome <@UG5GJTUF7> ! We’re excited to have you a part of our :sprocket: HubSpot Developer Community! :raised_hands::skin-tone-3:

Hi :wave::skin-tone-3: <@UFEK2AS87> - Welcome to the community! ... Most HubSpot developers will create a very simple template with a global header, global footer and a flex column in the body. 

Then they will create lots of modules that can be drag and dropped into the flex column body. 

This is based on Atomic design principles. It is more time consuming up front, however, it gives much more flexibility for updates later and will give the marketers using the website the ability to update on their own. This will save time on the long run. 

You can learn more by taking the new “HubSpot CMS for Developers Certification” - <https://academy.HubSpot.com/courses/cms-for-developers>

The above resources are the best <@UG5F3JMHR> , however, keep in mind that these are all created for folks who already know coding. 

If you need to learn HTML, CSS, and JavaScript - is recommend checking out the coding courses on TreeHouse or <http://CodeCademy.com|CodeCademy.com>
